```{r init, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(dygraphs)
library(xts)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
library(plotly)

#project.id <- 'modeling.sirius'
file.evol = paste("", project.id, "_git_commits_evol.csv", sep="")
evol <- read.csv(file=file.evol, header=T)
evol$commits_sum <- cumsum(evol$commits)
#evol$date_ext <- paste(evol$date, "-01", sep="")
evol.xts <- xts(x = evol[,c('commits_sum', 'commits', 'authors')], order.by=as.POSIXct(as.character(evol[,c('date')]), format="%Y-%m-%d"))

gg <- ggplot(data=evol.xts, aes( x = index(evol.xts), y = commits)) + geom_line()+
  theme_minimal()

# Save image to png and svg
ggsave(file=paste(project.id, "_git_evol_commits.svg", sep=''), plot=gg, width=10, height=8)
ggsave(file=paste(project.id, "_git_evol_commits.png", sep=''), plot=gg, width=10, height=8)

p <-dygraph(evol.xts[,c('commits')],
        main = paste('Commits for ', project.id, sep=''),
        width = 800, height = 250 ) %>%
      dyRangeSelector()
p
```
